data.title: Pink Floyd Archives
data.text:
Pink Floyd

United States

Soundtrack LP Discography

by Vernon Fitch

© copyright Vernon Fitch / The Pink Floyd Archives

This is a discography of Pink Floyd related vinyl soundtrack albums (LPs) that have been released in the United States.

Any comments, corrections or additions to this discography would be appreciated.

Quick Click Guide

[Soundtracks]

[The Pink Floyd Discographies Page]

[Reference Directory] [Pink Floyd Archives home page]

Albums

How to "read" your records

Secrets of the matrix and more

(click here for article) Soundtracks

Zabriskie Point

MGM Special Disc Jockey Record MGM Records promo issue MGM Records 1st issue MGM Records 2nd issue MCA Records 3rd issue 4 Men With Beards 4th issue Watertower Music 2-LP 5th issue

Knebworth

Soundtracks

Zabriskie Point LP

MGM Special Disc Jockey Record

Title: Zabriskie Point (MGM Special Disc Jockey Record)

Record Label: MGM Records

Catalog Number: SE-4668ST

Matrix Information: (side 1 / side 2)

1) SE 4668-ST MGS-2154 S/1 DP / SE 4668 ST MGS 2155-1 S/2 D.P. (both written)

2) SE 4668-ST MGS-2154 S/1 DP / SE 4668 ST MGS 2155 S/2 D.P. (both written)

Release Date: April 12, 1970

Release Information: MGM Special Disc Jockey Record. This release has an orange oval "DJ Not For Sale" sticker on the back cover.

Pink Floyd Songs Included: Heart Beat Pig Meat, Crumbling Land, Come In Number 51 Your Time Is Up.

Description:

Front Cover: Title. Picture from the movie.

Back Cover: Song listing. Credits.

Spine: SE-4668ST Zabriskie Point STEREO

Labels: Yellow MGM labels, with the words "M-G-M Special Disc Jockey Record" printed on the labels.

Zabriskie Point LP

MGM Records promo

Title: Zabriskie Point (MGM Records promo)

Record Label: MGM Records

Catalog Number: SE-4668ST

Matrix Information: (side 1 / side 2)

1) SE 4668 ST MGS 2154 S/1 DP / SE-4668-ST SIDE-2 MGS-2155 (both written)

Release Information: MGM promo copy with white promo label.

Pink Floyd Songs Included: Heart Beat Pig Meat, Crumbling Land, Come In Number 51 Your Time Is Up.

Description:

Front Cover: Title. Picture from the movie.

Back Cover: Song listing. Credits. The words "Promotional Not For Sale" are stamped in black ink on the back cover.

Spine: SE-4668ST Zabriskie Point STEREO

Labels: White label promo labels, with the letters MGM around the edge of the labels, and "Not For Sale" printed on the labels.

Zabriskie Point LP

MGM Records 1st issue

Title: Zabriskie Point (MGM Records 1st issue)

Record Label: MGM Records

Catalog Number: SE-4668ST

Matrix Information: (side 1 / side 2)

1) SE 4668 ST MGS 2154 S/1 DP / SE-4668-ST SIDE-2 MGS-2155 (both written)

Release Date: April 12, 1970

Release Information: Soundtrack from the movie.

Pink Floyd Songs Included: Heart Beat Pig Meat, Crumbling Land, Come In Number 51 Your Time Is Up.

Description:

Front Cover: Title. Picture from the movie.

Back Cover: Song listing. Credits.

Spine: SE-4668ST Zabriskie Point STEREO

Inner Sleeve: MGM Records inner sleeve with pictures of records by Herman's Hermits, Hank Williams, David Rose, Lou Christie, Sam the Sham & the Pharaos, The Royalettes, Connie Francis, Errol Garner, Roy Orbison and Hank Williams Jr.

Labels: Blue / gold MGM labels.

To the left of the spindle hole, it says:

STEREO

SE 4668 ST

(MGS 2154) To the right of the spindle hole, it says:

SIDE 1

The song titles are followed by the full name of the wrtiers in paranthesis, followed by the publishing company, ASCAP, and the name of the band (THE PINK FLOYD).

Text around bottom edge of label starts at 8 o'clock and says:MGM Records - A division of Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Inc. - Made in U.S.A.

Zabriskie Point LP

MGM Records 2nd issue

Title: Zabriskie Point (MGM Records 2nd issue)

Record Label: MGM Records

Catalog Number: SE-4668ST

Matrix Information: (side 1 / side 2)

1) SE 4668-ST MGS-2154 S/1 DP / SE 4668 ST MGS 2155 S/2 DP (both written)

2) SE 4668-ST MGS-2154 S/1 DP 11 / SE 4668 ST MGS 2155 S/2 DP 21 (both written, except 11 and 21 are stamped) [L1]

3) SE 4668 MGS 2154-1 S/1 D.P. 11 / SE 4668 ST MGS 2155 S/2 DP 21 (both written, except 11 and 21 are stamped)

4) SE 4668 MGS 2154-1 S/1 D.P. 12 / SE 4668 ST MGS 2155 S/2 DP 21 (both written, except 12 and 21 are stamped) [L2]

5) SE 4668 MGS 2154-1 S/1 DP 12 / SE 4668 ST-MGS 2155 -1 S/2 DP 21 (both written, except 12 and 21 are stamped)

Pressing Plant: MGM Records Mfg., Bloomfield, N.J.

Release Information: Soundtrack from the movie. Reissue with different label layout

Pink Floyd Songs Included: Heart Beat Pig Meat, Crumbling Land, Come In Number 51 Your Time Is Up.

Description:

Front Cover: Title. Picture from the movie.

Back Cover: Song listing. Credits.

Spine: SE-4668ST

Inner Sleeve: MGM Records inner sleeve with pictures of records by Herman's Hermits, Hank Williams, David Rose, Lou Christie, Sam the Sham & the Pharaos, The Royalettes, Connie Francis, Errol Garner, Roy Orbison and Hank Williams Jr.

Labels #1: Blue / gold MGM labels. "Album Prod. By Don Hall." Publishing credit for the song Sugar Babe on side 1 says "Jesse Colin Young."

Labels #2: Blue / gold MGM labels. "Music Coordinated by Don Hall." Publishing credit for the song Sugar Babe on side 1 says "Pigfoot Music."

To the left of the spindle hole, it says:

STEREO

Side 1 To the right of the spindle hole, it says:

SE4668 ST

MGS 2154

The word STEREO is in very large capital letters, while Side 1, SE4668 ST, and MGS 2154 are much smaller. The song titles are followed by a dash, and the timing. Underneath the song titles, on a separate line, are the last names of the writers in paranthesis, followed by the publishing company, ASCAP, and the band names.

Text around bottom edge of label starts at 8 o'clock and says:MGM Records - A division of Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Inc. - Made in U.S.A.

Zabriskie Point reissue LP

MCA Classical Soundtracks Records reissue

Title: Zabriskie Point (MCA Classical Soundtracks Records 3rd issue)

Record Label: MCA Classical Soundtracks Records

Catalog Number: MCA-25032

Matrix Information: (side 1 / side 2)

1) MCA 5526 W1 / MCA 5527 W1 (both written)

2) MCA 5526 W2 / MCA 5527 W2 (both written) (also found with a promo stamp on back cover)

Release Date: 1986

Release Information: Reissue on MCA records. Promotional copies have a gold promo stamp on the back cover that says "Lent for Promotional Use Only. Any Sale or Unauthorized Transfer is Prohibited and Void. Subject to Return Upon Demand by Owner. Acceptance of This Record Constitutes Agreement to the Above."

Description:

Front Cover: Picture from the movie. In the top left corner is the MGM-logo, in the top right corner under the tracklisting is a MCA Classics Soundtrack logo.

Back Cover: Song listing. Credits.

Spine: MCA-25032 Music From the Motion Picture Soundtrack ZABRISKIE POINT

Labels: Blue sky with clouds and rainbow MCA labels.

Text around bottom edge of label starts at 8 o'clock and says:

© 1980 MCA Records, Inc. Mfd. by MCA Records, Inc. 70 Universal Plaza, Universal City, Calif. 91608.

Zabriskie Point LP

4 Men With Beards 4th issue

Title: Zabriskie Point (4 Men with Beards 180 gram HQ vinyl issue)

Record Label: 4 Men With Beards

Catalog Number: 4M123

Matrix Information: (side 1 / side 2)

1) 4M-123A1 / 4M-123B1 (both written)

Release Date: January 2004

Release Information: 180 gram HQ vinyl reissue. Includes an inner sleeve with liner notes by Steve Dollar of Brooklyn, N.Y. dated July 27, 2003.

Description: Gatefold cover.

Front Cover: Picture from the movie. In the lower right corner is the 4 Men with Beards logo.

Back Cover: Song listing. Credits.

Inside Cover: Pictures from the movie.

Spine: Music From the Motion Picture Soundtrack ZABRISKIE POINT 4M123

Cover Sticker: Blue info sticker on shrink wrap.

Inner Sleeve: Text about the movie on the front. Blank back.

Labels: Black 4 Men with Beards labels.

Zabriskie Point 2-LP

Watertower Music 5th issue

Title: Zabriskie Point (Watertower Music 5th issue)

Record Label: Watertower Music

Catalog Number: WTM39474

Bar Code: 7 94043 17292 2

Matrix Information: (side 1 / side 2)

1) 97209 1A WTM 39474 / 97209 1B WTM 39474 / 97209 1C WTM 39474 / 97209 1D WTM 39474 (both written)

Release Date: November 29, 2013

Release Information: Double album. A Record Store Day release from 2013.

Description: Gatefold cover.

Front Cover: Picture from the movie. Title.

Back Cover: Picture from the movie. Song listing. Credits. Bar code.

Inside Cover: Pictures from the movie. Write up about the movie. Credits.

Spine: Title. Catalog number.

Labels: Watertower Music labels.

Text around bottom edge of label starts at 8 o'clock and says:

P & © 2013 Turner Entertainment Co. / WTM39474 / Manufactured in Holland by Furnace.

Knebworth 2-LP

PolyGram Records

Title: Knebworth

Record Label: PolyGram Records

Catalog Number: 847 042-1

Matrix Information: (side 1 / side 2 / side 3 / side 4)

1) 422-847-043-1-A-SP2 SP1-3 / 422-847-043-1-B-SP1-DMM SP1-1 / 422-847-044-1-A-SP1 DMM SP1-1 MASTERDISK / 422-847-044-1-B-SP1 DMM SP1-1 (all four written)

Release Date: August 1990

Release Information: Double album of live performances from the Knebworth Festival in 1990. Includes Pink Floyd performances of Comfortably Numb, and Run Like Hell. Inner sleeves list festival credits and band personnel.

Description: Gatefold cover.

Front Cover: Title. Live photo from the festival.

Back Cover: List of bands. Song titles. Credits.

Inside Cover: Pictures of bands performing.

Spine: 847 042-1 KNEBWORTH THE ALBUM POLYDOR

Inner Sleeves: [1 front] [1 back] [2 front] [2 back] Text about the festival. Song listing. Credits.

Labels: Red Polydor labels.

Text around bottom edge of label starts at 1 o'clock and says:

Manufactured and marketed by Polygram Records, Inc. New York, New York. All rights reserved. Unauthorized copying, reproduction, hiring, lending, public performance and broadcasting prohibited. Printed in USA.
